name: AudioVerse
description: Accessing the thousands of Bible-based, Christ-centered, Spirit-filled messages from AudioVerse has never been easier! Now you can access the vast library of sermons, seminars, lectures, and audiobooks in the palm of your hand wherever you are.  Features: -Navigate the AudioVerse archive through an intuitive interface designed for your mobile device. -Download your favorite messages to listen to later--even without an Internet connection. -Share your favorite sermon through various social media outlets with just a tap of the finger. -Listen to Audio Bible -Listen to Scripture Songs -More features are on the way!  AudioVerse is a website dedicated to spreading Gods word through free sermon audio and much more. If you would like to learn more about AudioVerse please visit AudioVerse.org.
